Tod Whipple is a serial entrepreneur, tech geek, and real estate developer. He is the founder of StartupAddict.com, a resource designed for budding entrepreneurs seeking funding. He is an advocate for startups and small business initiatives everywhere. Tod earned the prestigious CCIM designation and has extensive knowledge in financial analysis, complex financing formulation, market analysis and investment analysis.
